SELECT a.seq ,a.nickname ,a.dob ,b.codeNameKor ,a.phoneAgency ,a.phoneNum ,a.email ,a.emailInsert ,a.emailDomain ,a.id ,a.password ,a.datetime ,a.delNy FROM jsMember a inner join code b on b.codeAnother = a.gender WHERE 1=1 AND a.delNy = #{shdelNy}
AND gender = 101 AND gender = 102
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
order by a.seq asc
